item.title: Frictionless Data May 2021 Virtual Hangout
item.description: On our last Frictionless Data community call on May 29 we had Simon Tyrrell and Xingdong Bian from the Earlham Institute giving a presentation on Frictionless Data for Wheat.

item.title: Frictionless Data April 2021 Virtual Hangout
item.description: On our last Frictionless Data community call on April 29 we had an interactive session with our great Frictionless Data Fellows.

item.title: Unveiling the new Frictionless Data documentation portal
item.description: We invite you all to read our new and improved documentation portal that we created for Frictionless Framework

item.title: Frictionless Data Package for InterMine
item.description: This blog is part of a series showcasing projects developed during the 2020 Tool Fund.

item.title: Frictionless Data March 2021 Virtual Hangout
item.description: On our last Frictionless Data community call on March 25th, we dealt with a very current topic thanks to Thorben Westerhuys, who presented his project on Frictionless Vaccination data.

item.title: Frictionless Data for Wheat
item.description: This blog is part of a series showcasing projects developed during the 2020-2021 Tool Fund. The Tool Fund provided five mini-grants of $5,000 to support individuals or organisations in developing an open tool for reproducible research.

item.title: Frictionless Data February 2021 Virtual Hangout
item.description: On this February Community Call we had a top notch code demonstration of the new frictionless.py framework by our Frictionless Data senior developer Evgeny Karev.

item.title: How we are improving the quality and interoperability of Frictionless Data
item.description: We are halfway through the process of reviewing our documentation and adding new features to Frictionless Data, and wanted to give a status update showing how this work is improving the overall Frictionless experience.

item.title: HuBMAP - Table Schema generating an Excel template
item.description: The Human BioMolecular Atlas Program Given has developed tableschema-to-template which takes a Frictionless Table Schema as input, and returns an Excel template with embedded documentation and basic validations.

item.title: Frictionless Data January 2021 Virtual Hangout
item.description: On January 28th we had our first Frictionless Data Community Call for 2021. It was great to see it was so well attended!
